About
About
Welcome Home
Mass and Confessions
Our Parish
Join Our Parish Community
Clergy and Staff Directory
St. Maximilian Kolbe's Story
Contact Us
Directions
Warm greetings to all from the St. Maximilian Kolbe faith community!
Whether you are new to our parish or have been a long-time member, you are welcome.
The Eucharist - the real presence of Jesus Christ on the altar -
is at the heart of our Catholic identity and all that we do here at St. Maximilian Kolbe. We offer seven weekend Masses as well as daily Mass throughout the week. Eucharistic Adoration is held in the Church beginning after the 8:00 am Mass on Monday through Friday. On the First Friday of the month, Eucharistic Adoration is held in the Chapel after the morning Mass until 10:00 pm, every Tuesday at 7:00 pm with our Youth Ministry, every Wednesday at 6:15 pm, and every third Friday of the month at 7:30 pm.
We are a big parish with an even bigger heart, and there are many ways for you to find your place of belonging here. Opportunities abound for spiritual development, service outreach and social interaction. Take some time to explore our website, where you will find information on the many organizations, activities and services of St. Maximilian Kolbe.
Our clergy and staff are here to assist you and to make you feel welcome. Do not hesitate to call, email or stop by to talk with us. We are here to serve.
May God bless you always,
Father Jeff McCormick
St. Maximilian Kolbe Catholic Parish
701 North Hiatus Road   •   Pembroke Pines FL 33026   •   Tel (954) 432-0206

Clergy and Staff Directory
About
Welcome Home
Mass and Confessions
Our Parish
Join Our Parish Community
Clergy and Staff Directory
St. Maximilian Kolbe's Story
Contact Us
Directions
Pastoral Staff
Fr. Jeff McCormick, Pastor
, Pastor
Fr. Octavio Gomez, Parochial Vicar
Deacons
Rev. Mr. Pierre Douyon
Rev. Mr. Scott Joiner
Rev. Mr. Manuel Mendoza
Emergencies
In case of serious illness or death, notify the rectory immediately at
(954) 432-0206
.
Pastoral Care of the Sick and Homebound
Please call the Church Office if anyone is sick at home, in the hospital, or in nursing home and wishes to be visited.
Wedding Preparation
The Archdiocese of Miami requires six-month preparation time. Meet with our Wedding Coordinator to make wedding arrangements. Please contact Mrs. Alex Martín in the Church Office at
(954) 432-0206
.
Administrative Staff
Mrs. Alejandrina "Alex" Martín, Parish Secretary
Mrs. Maryann Hotchkiss, Director of Religious Education
Mrs. Jimena Hibbard, Director of Pre-School
Mr. Tomas Castillo, Director of Music (English and Children)
Mrs. JoEmma Vomvolakis, Music Minister (Life Teen Mass)
Mr. Alvaro Ramos, Music Minister (Spanish Mass)
Mrs. Meschelle Huether, Finance Manager
Mr. Diego Vallina, Youth Minister
Communications Coordinator and Local Safe Environment Coordinator
Ms. Joanna Pietro, HR and Operations Manager
Ms. Gilda Pietro, Sacristan
Ms. Lourdes Duboy, Receptionist
St. Maximilian Kolbe Catholic Parish
701 North Hiatus Road   •   Pembroke Pines FL 33026   •   Tel (954) 432-0206
